About Me

I am a backend developer with 4 years of experience in designing and implementing large-scale distributed systems, primarily using Java and Spring.

Currently, I work on the advertising system development team at LINE, the leading messenger app in Japan, Taiwan, and Thailand, where we handle billions of data points daily. I have a deep interest in the advertising domain and continuously strive to design system architectures that provide the best user experience.

I am always on the lookout for better solutions and contribute to enhancing the performance and stability of the advertising platform. With this experience, I am committed to developing innovative, user-centric systems in the future.

A global advertising platform targeting 200 million LINE users worldwide, including Japan, Thailand, and Taiwan.

Developed and maintained a large-scale distributed system for the advertising platform (DSP).

Achievements

Projects

AI-Powered Ad Campaign Generator

A comprehensive AI-driven system that automates the entire ad campaign creation process using LangGraph (LangChain) agents.

2025.05 ~ ing

  • Designed and implemented an intelligent agent-based architecture using Python LangGraph (LangChain) for automated ad campaign generation
  • Developed a multi-agent system that generates complete ad campaigns, including targeting strategies and creative assets, from minimal input (brand name, LP URL, budget)
  • Architected an end-to-end solution that autonomously creates optimized advertising campaigns with proper targeting configurations
  • Integrated AI capabilities to intelligently analyze business requirements and generate contextually relevant advertising materials
  • Built orchestration logic to coordinate multiple AI agents for campaign planning, audience targeting, and creative generation

skill keywords: LangChain, AI Agent, Architecture, Campaign Automation

Generative AI Ad Creative

A project to automatically generate high-performing ad images and text using generative AI capabilities.

2024.01 ~ ing

  • Led the development and operation of both backend and frontend for the AI-powered ad creative generation system

  • Designed a fast and scalable service using Python FastAPI to meet high-performance requirements
  • Established a CI/CD pipeline for seamless system deployment and performance testing
  • Built a data ingestion pipeline for KPI metric measurement and creative performance analysis
  • Conducted research and various tests to optimize AI-generated creative quality and effectiveness

skill keywords: Python, FastAPI, OpenAI, Generative AI, Architecture

A comprehensive ad management system that handles the core DSP functionality including campaign management, targeting data, and ad creative delivery.

2022.01 ~ ing

  • Managed the entire ad data pipeline from creation to serving, ensuring data consistency and reliability

skill keywords: Java, Spring Boot, Architecture, MySQL, Ad Campaign Management, Ad Serving, Distributed Systems

Report Service

A large-scale reporting system for the advertising DSP platform that processes massive volumes of ad performance data and delivers actionable insights to advertisers.

2023.03 ~ ing

  • Designed and implemented a high-throughput data pipeline handling over 30 million ad events daily
  • Built real-time asynchronous processing system to ingest and aggregate large-scale advertising performance data
  • Utilized Spring Batch and Jenkins to partition and process daily report metrics efficiently
  • Developed complex aggregation logic and native queries to provide diverse advertising performance metrics
  • Optimized asynchronous processing tasks to prevent system overload and ensure data accuracy
  • Performed continuous refactoring for performance optimization and system scalability
  • Delivered accurate and timely advertising performance reports to advertisers through efficient batch processing

skill keywords: Java, Spring Boot, Apache Kafka, MySQL, Spring Batch, Jenkins, Data Pipeline, High-Volume Processing
